fields.headline: News in brief
fields.bodyText: Bmibaby adds more destinations Bmibaby will expand its services from East Midlands Airport to offer 23 destinations by the end of the year. The no-frills airline is taking over current Bmi routes to Amsterdam, Belfast, Brussels, Edinburgh, Glasgow, Paris and Jersey and will introduce flights to Madrid, Salzburg and Toulouse from 27 October. (0870 264 2229). Ski creches Creches will be available for the first time in Thomson's 2002/3 Ski and Snowboarding brochure. The operator has added creches for children aged six months to four years in three resorts in France and Switzerland. Children under the age of seven ski free in Italy.(0870 606 1470) World of adventure Escorted tour specialist Bales Worldwide (0870 241 3208) has added a gorilla tracking tour to Uganda and a 12-day journey through Ethiopia to its Inspirational World Journeys 2003 brochure. There will also be a one-off departure to Bhutan which features the remote Indian state of Sikkim.
